entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 p.m. MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h except east 90 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
